name: base32

options.description: wrap encoded lines after COLS character (default 76). Use 0 to disable line wrapping

tldr:
> Encode or decode file or standard input to/from Base32, to standard output.
> More information: <https://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/base32>.

- Encode a file:

`base32 {{filename}}`

- Decode a file:

`base32 --decode {{filename}}`

- Encode from stdin:

`{{somecommand}} | base32`

- Decode from stdin:

`{{somecommand}} | base32 --decode`
